org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.painting
Class SmoothTilePainter

java.lang.Object
  org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.painting.BasePaintVisitor
      org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.painting.SimplePaintVisitor
          org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.painting.SmoothTilePainter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Visitor, IPlugin, IPaintVisitor
public class SmoothTilePainter
extends SimplePaintVisitor

A reimplementation of TilePaintVisitor that (down)loads tiles asynchronously.

Author:
Paul Soucy
